title: HawkEye 360 acquires Maxar’s RF Solutions business unit
summary: HawkEye 360 announced the acquisition Dec. 18 of Maxar Intelligence RF Solutions, the business unit formed after Maxar acquired Aurora Insight.

title: Daily Telescope: Tracking the Sun’s path every day across the sky
summary: The image is a vivid demonstration of the changing of the seasons.

title: Space Force’s first six missile-defense satellites in medium orbit to cost about $500 million
summary: The U.S. Space Force awarded Millennium Space Systems contracts worth $509.5 million for the first six satellites of a medium Earth orbit constellation to detect and track ballistic and hypersonic missiles.

title: SaxaVord Spaceport receives U.K. license
summary: A launch facility under development in the Shetland Islands has become the first licensed vertical spaceport in the United Kingdom, although exactly when it will host its first launch remains uncertain.

title: SaxaVord Becomes UK’s First Licensed Vertical Launch Spaceport
summary:
The United Kingdom’s Civil Aviation Authority has granted its first vertical launch spaceport license to SaxaVord Spaceport in Scotland. SaxaVord initially submitted its spaceport license application to the CAA in March 2022. On 17 December, the CAA announced that SaxaVord’s application had been approved. “SaxaVord has been assessed by the space regulator to verify that […]
